Movie & Dining: BOGO Offers on Movie Ticket Bookings Via District App. 15% Off on Partner Restaurants and Flat ₹120 Off on Food Orders with Swiggy.
Reward Redemption: EDGE Points earned on the card are redeemable against shopping/travel vouchers or for purchasing products on the Axis Bank EDGE Rewards Portal
Domestic Lounge Access: 1 Complimentary Lounge Access Every Quarter (4 Each Year)

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived off at all filling stations across India for transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 4,000 (max waiver capped at Rs. 400 per month)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawal amount subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500

product_details: Complimentary SonyLiv Premium annual subscription as a joining benefit.
4 EDGE Points per ₹200 spent with the Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card.
Discount on Swiggy of ₹120 per order (minimum order value of ₹500 required).
Buy One Get One offer on movie ticket bookings via District.
1 complimentary domestic airport lounge access per quarter.
Flat discount of ₹1,000 on AJIO on minimum spends of ₹2,999.
15% off up to ₹500 on a minimum order of ₹1500 with the EazyDiner program.
